pkgmetadata.longdescription: wsgi-oauth2===========.. image:: docs/_static/oauth2.pngThis module provides a simple WSGI middleware that requires the user toauthenticate via the specific `OAuth 2.0`_ service, e.g., Facebook_, Google_,GitHub_.You can install the package via downloading from PyPI_:.. code-block:: console $ pip install wsgi-oauth2Read the documentation_ as well... _OAuth 2.0: https://oauth.net/2/.. _Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/.. _Google: https://www.google.com/.. _GitHub: https://github.com/.. _PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/wsgi-oauth2/.. _documentation: https://dahlia.github.io/wsgi-oauth2/
